Question: What roles and connections does the character Izna have in the movie?
Options:
A. a) Izna is portrayed by Sunny Leone.
B. b) Izna is an adult film star turned spy.
C. c) Izna works for an intelligence agency.
D. d) Izna has no connection to an intelligence agency.
Answer: a) Izna is portrayed by Sunny Leone., b) Izna is an adult film star turned spy., c) Izna works for an intelligence agency.
